I just picked up Half-Life 2 again after all these years, because I realized I had never beaten it and wanted to finish it before Half-Life: Alyx comes out. I remembered playing it a couple years ago and getting to Ravenholm before losing my save and quitting for a while.

My GOD, I wish I had finished this game. I have only beaten 15~ games this year, but this has by far been the best one. It blew all of the new titles I played this year (Resident Evil 2, Link's Awakening, Sekiro, Days Gone, Slay the Spire) out of the water. This game has aged so well in every aspect, and I swear the physics are still better than the vast majority of games that have been released this decade and this game is from 2004.

Now that I'm older and less patient, I find myself getting to that point of "alright, let's wrap this shit up" with most newer games. Some of them just drag on for so much longer than they need to, solely with the goal of giving false value because the game is longer than 10 hours. Half-Life 2 is about 10-15 hours on your first playthrough, and you'll enjoy every minute of it. Each chapter ends at the perfect time and the game does not overstay its welcome - if anything, I wish it were a bit longer.

I would make a list of pros and cons but literally the only con I can think of is that I'm now disappointed I probably won't see Half-Life 3 in my lifetime, but the announcement of Half-Life: Alyx gives me hope. You owe it to yourself to play this game.
Хорошая игра, не смотря на возраст вполне нормальная графика, понятный сюжет. Одна из лучших частей. В общем must have !

I am currently on  chapter 8 and this is amazing! Great physics engine! This is how all sequels should be. Valve does great with sequels! I am hyped to play more! I bought this on sale but is obviously worth its price!

8说了 绝对的经典好游戏
没啥好说的 节奏安排贼棒                                                                             
        特别是莱温霍姆镇 真的氛围渲染贼棒！！！！是我最喜欢的一段剧情（除了毒猎头蟹 母体biss!!! WDNMD人没见到一滴血，是个上分的好日子x）
       见到神父的时候我就爱了，简直是口渴到极致的一口泉水   还有出了矿道的那一束光，见到街上和回了家一样。                                                  
       费劲儿打死三脚机甲后进入城堡看到幽灵的背后一凉，以及拿到究极重力枪后疯狂收割人头的心理变化 真的从难到难受到爽，带动玩家情感过山车，极致享受。
      就是关卡长度设置的刚刚好就很难受，刚开游戏不习惯视角的时候开船抖动的给我整出来一个刚刚好想吐的感觉，就很奇妙。（心里暗暗咒骂了一句shift！）                             
8说了 value牛逼！！！
不过有一说一 每一段关卡稍微短一点点就好了，节奏就稍微轻松一点点了（我教v社做游戏系列）还有这个反人类的视角。。。没啥3d眩晕的我也给 水陆两用-飞天遁地-滑翔侧翻-机巧船撞到陆地也能从容加速-究极-碰碰船整傻了。
9.5/10

If you (for some reason) would feel inclined towards playing just one first person single player shooter in your life, make sure it's Half-life 2. Period. Fun, balanced, with a great storyline and innovative action, it's still hard to find an equally memorable action game in 2019.  

Oh, and PLEASE Valve, give us Half-life 3.
